name: RI_1_1_26_Encrypt_Record_Entries
title: RI.1.1.26 Encrypt Record Entries (Function)
description: Encrypt Record Entries (1 or more instances)
purpose:
Encrypt Record Lifecycle Event - occurs when an agent causes the system to encode record entry content in a cipher. 

Reference: ISO 21089-2018, Section 15.26.

statement.label: RI.1.1.26#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL provide the ability to render encrypted Record Entry content based on a cipher.

statement.label: RI.1.1.26#02
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD maintain the original and all previous versions of the Record Entry, retaining each version instance without alteration.

statement.label: RI.1.1.26#03
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture a new uniquely identifiable version of the Record Entry, incorporating encrypted content.
